# Government Tender Announcement: Remotely Piloted Aircraft System – Infrastructure AMDet(E)

## Document Details

*   Reference Number: MX-22593799330
*   Solicitation Number: GW001035_78764
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Publication Date: 2022-10-13
*   Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-22T14:00:00

## Project Overview

The Government of Canada seeks to establish a Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) – Infrastructure Air Maintenance Detachment (East) (AMDet(E)) facility in Greenwood, Nova Scotia, through a competitive Design Build Services procurement process. The project scope includes the design and construction of the new facility.

## Tender Details

*   Procurement Category: SRV Service (Miscellaneous services)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
*   Trade Agreements: Consult the Government of Canada's website for more information

## Key Dates

*   Project Start Date: 2028-04-28
*   Project End Date: 2028-04-28
*   Closing Date for Tenders: 2022-11-22T14:00:00
*   Contact Information: Andrew Webster, 613-949-7930

## Tender Requirements

Information is available on MERX.com, and bidders must register through this electronic bidding system to submit their tenders. 

## Evaluation Criteria

Proponents will be evaluated based on the established criteria in the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents. The proponent with the highest score will be selected for negotiation of the contract.

## Budget and Deadlines

The estimated construction cost for the project is approximately $100 million. The deadline for tender submission is set at 2022-11-22T14:00:00. All Tenders must be submitted via the MERX electronic bidding system. 

## Queries and Inquiries

Queries or inquiries should be directed to Andrew Webster, construction procurement specialist, from Defence Construction Canada. To access the tender documents, please visit MERX.com.
